it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.client

Interface CoapResponseHandler


  • public interface CoapResponseHandler
    It handles the reception of a response for a given request (or failure).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onRequestFailure(CoapRequest req)
      When a RST is received or the transaction timeout expired for a Confirmable request.
      void onResponse(CoapRequest req, CoapResponse resp)
      When a CoAP response is received.

    • Method Detail

      • onResponse

        void onResponse(CoapRequest req,
                CoapResponse resp)
        When a CoAP response is received.
        Parameters:
        req - the CoAP request that the received message is responding
        resp - the received CoAP response

        When a RST is received or the transaction timeout expired for a Confirmable request.
